metadata.title: USN-6630-1 -- Glance_store vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that Glance_store incorrectly handled logging when the DEBUG log level is enabled. A local attacker could use this issue to obtain access_key values.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6630-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  python-glance-store-doc - 3.0.0-0ubuntu1.4 python3-glance-store - 3.0.0-0ubuntu1.4 No subscription required
